description.para: Recursively creates or deletes _index files of specified directory and all its subdirectories.

param.param_note: Recursively deletes _index file of specified directory and all its subdirectories.
Target directory list. If target path is not specified, the target directory is the default path: Current Elastos target mirror directory\bin directory. For example D:\Elastos.SDK\obj\_ix86.dbg\bin

remarks.para: The _index file contains the listing of the files that are in the specified directory. The _index file is used by the TFTP file system.

example.eg_note: Recursively creates _index files of d:\Elastos.SDK\obj\_ntos.dbg\samples directory and all its subdirectories.
Recursively deletes _index files of d:\Elastos.SDK\obj\_ntos.dbg\samples directory and all its subdirectories.

example.eg_result:
mktfs: generate/delete index files for specified directories and their sub directories on host machines for Elastos Tftp FS.
usage: mktfs [-h] [-d] [dirs] ... -h show this message -d delete index files dirs target directory list. if no direcotry specified, use the default: D:\Elastos.SDK\obj\_ix86.dbg\bin
